name: WELCOME
description:
WELCOME is a hardcore survival game that will be in a newer version with a bit of battleroyale style
where the task of the players is to survive on the map the effects of the weather (cold, extreme heat), with reason to use sprint because of stamina.
To find things to survive, such as food and drink, craft plants that make bands and trees for wood to build a future storage base.
find the weapons they will defend and if they survive long enough to win DEADZONE in which all players will meet.
Because of the large map and many areas, players will have to explore the entire map to know where it is.
The map contains army camps, towns, villages and the environment is very forested and partly very thick.
Poor food management can lead to starvation, dehydration, or complete death of the character.

Survive at map and win in DEADZONE
